name: Android Army
description:
This game is a single player endless top down shooter with the player trying to kill all the robots which spawn in randomly and endlessly.

This game was created by a collaboration of chairmanfmao and linxelsoul where we both created everything about this game - the code, graphics and audio.

This game was our first time that we used pygame and it has been quite the educational experience.

The game was created on replit and you can play it there if you don't want to download it:

 https://replit.com/@ChairmanFMao/GameJamWeek265-Andriod-Army?v=1
